caption.p: (a) Spatial distribution of 1160 patients, enrolled via health services in Barranquilla. All patients enrolled during the study agreed to disclose their address and were visited throughout the recruiting period. (b) Number of cases during the CHIKV outbreak in Barranquilla during weeks 36 to 52 of 2014. Cases included in this study were recruited during weeks 36 (September) to 52 (December) shown in red.
